issue.title: [C++] Support Fastpfor compress and decompress
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11397](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11397). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11397?focusedCommentId=17275735) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Note this is a duplicate of abandoned ARROW-1099.  Also I don't think we should adopt this into the standard/libraries until there is better support across languages for lz4 zstd.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11397?focusedCommentId=17448221) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I'll close this as well, as is the duplicated issue.
